notes:
These creatures are actually invisible, but they cannot be looked at and spawn on top of the Mystic Energy objects that look like electrical sparks. Despite not being possible to target them, they can be killed by convinced [[Rift Fragment]]'s AoE [[Drown Damage]] attack. 

{{JSpoiler|They are encountered during the fight against [[Ascending Ferumbras]] during the [[Ferumbras' Ascension Quest]].}}
name: Mystic Energy
behaviour: They are fixed in position, unable to move.
strategy: Avoid staying next to them as they seem to attack more often in close range, possibly with melee attacks.
